sources.title: Frontier Scout
sources.description: A B-western starring George Houston as Wild Bill Hickok, supported by Al St. John and Dave O'Brien. Mantan Moreland appears in a minor role. Directed by Sam Newfield Released in 1938 2 minutes are missing

sources.title: Frontier Scout (1938) GEORGE HOUSTON
sources.description:
Stars: George Houston, Al St. John, Mantan Moreland
 Director: Sam Newfield

 After fighting in the Civil War, Wild Bill Hickok and Whiney head west to investigate missing cattle herds. There they meet their war buddy Norris who is now in the cattle business. When he is unable to explain the missing herds, Bill goes into action.

metadata.Plot: After fighting in the Civil War, Wild Bill Hickok and Whiney head west to investigate missing cattle herds. There they meet their war buddy Norris who is now in the cattle business. When he is unable to explain the missing herds, Bill goes into action.
metadata.Actors: George Houston, Al St. John, Beth Marion
